Kristoffer Löf is a member of Mannheimer Swartling’s Dispute Resolution practice group and the firm’s industry groups for Energy and Infrastructure/Construction. Kristoffer is also President of the Swedish Arbitration Association.

Kristoffer is specialised in dispute resolution and assists in all stages of a dispute – from the early case assessments and claim letters to settlement negotiations and proceedings before Swedish courts and Swedish and international arbitral tribunals. He has experience from a wide range of areas and industry sectors, including telecom, pharmaceuticals, joint ventures, shareholders’ and cooperation agreements, machinery and equipment, licensing, agency and distribution, M&A etc., and with a particular emphasis on energy/oil & gas and construction disputes. In addition to counsel assignments, he also sits as arbitrator in commercial disputes.
